Tartarus

Lack of Time

05 Feb 2020

Once again I’ve not found enough time to be able to write properly about what has on my mind today, which I am a little frustrated with myself about. With that being said, here is what is hopefully to come in the following week on the blog:

  • Life, broken systems and the prisoner’s dilemma;
  • Poker;
  • Clean Language;
  • Kobe/Jacob;
  • Saving people and saving oneself.

Now I have to dash to a social event which I organised, which includes an insane 14 person dinner reservation - almost certainly this is the biggest event that I have birthed and coordinated myself. Don’t these people have better things to do with their time?
